content.raw:
In our case, in the current generated zip for ignition-math [we are hardcoding the full paths](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src/83baead60039d607100c9d5a84ca7322c935ca5a/cmake/ignition-math-config.cmake.in?at=default#cl-6) to libraries and headers at the moment of compiling, so when re-distributing to another machine, and change the installation directory, it can not work anymore. I did not investigate if this paths can be relative.

@sherm1 opensim is using a precompiled Simbody package or zip? If so, where I can find it? In the case of opensim is compiling simbody, then the paths are in sync with the filesystem, so that can be the reason why the whole thing works.
